name: Village building sim. (beta 1.1)
description: To get blueps (villagers) you need to build a house then get food. The one should spawn within 20-43 seconds. To get food you can build a farm or build a café.  og game on scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/710036209. This is beta 1.0 this game is the only build of beta 1.1
